revised_title: The Molecular Structure and Optical Properties of Melamine
tldr: The authors investigated the structure and properties of melamine, a compound with a cyanuric ring, using magnetic and X-ray measurements. They found that melamine has a layer structure, similar to other compounds with a cyanuric ring, and determined its principal refractive indices and optic axial angle. This research helps to understand the molecular structure and properties of melamine, which can be useful in its applications.
